html:
News Releases, Media Advisories

November 25, 2003

ATTENTION WIRE SERVICES, DAYBOOK EDITORS:
FINAL AUDIT REPORT ON
FRIENDS OF MIKE FERGUSON
The Federal Election Commission has made available the final audit report on Friends of Mike Ferguson (NJ 7th District). This audit covers the period of January 1, 2001 through December 31, 2002.

Contact: FEC Press Office (202) 694-1220, 999 E Street, NW
title: Final Audit Report on Friends of Mike Ferguson is Available
